item.title: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @owner_purez owner purez
item.description:
@owner_purez wrote:

guys,if u need help add my MSN found under my account info.

@[quote=“dragun 711, post:34, topic:238125”]I have same problem! idk how to connect to internet with ip! it only lets me use local! does ne1 no how? please try my server ancientelvespk.no-ip.biz . if it works tell me![/quote]
remove the server ip be because its advertising

item.title: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @roguex roguex
item.description:
@roguex wrote:

This post made me laugh, first you need to find out your internalIP, Start,Run>CMD>ipconfig/all.

192.168.2.1 IS THE ROUTER INTERNAL IP!

Forward the internal IP your on!, should be something like 192.168.2.2

Read full topic
item.source: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]

item.title: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @Doom32dd Doom32dd
item.description:
@Doom32dd wrote:

thats what i need to do now coz my [quote=“MoparScaperDude, post:29, topic:238125”]You MOST LIKELY arent filling the boxes in correctly.

The IP Address must be the LAN IP of the computer HOSTING THE SERVER. For example.

192.168.11.2 – COMPUTER I HOST ON (MAIN)
192.168.11.3 – COMPUTER I PLAY ON (LAPTOP)

In this case, you’d want to make it 192.168.11.2, since that is the computer that hosts it. Make sure you fill the boxes in correctly, and it should work :)[/quote]thats hwat i ned to do, host on desktop and play on computer because JRE wont work for me

i have been coding and i cant see the changes until i get JRE to work

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
item.source: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]

item.title: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

You MOST LIKELY arent filling the boxes in correctly.

The IP Address must be the LAN IP of the computer HOSTING THE SERVER. For example.

192.168.11.2 – COMPUTER I HOST ON (MAIN)
192.168.11.3 – COMPUTER I PLAY ON (LAPTOP)

In this case, you’d want to make it 192.168.11.2, since that is the computer that hosts it. Make sure you fill the boxes in correctly, and it should work

Read full topic
item.source: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]

item.title: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @Doom32dd Doom32dd
item.description:
@Doom32dd wrote:

Well it looks like the same problem i had :\

  1. Get Hamachi
  2. instead of using your regular ip, use the hamachi ip for your no-ip
  3. get people on your hamachi
  4. have them conenect to your server

attempt that coz i had same problem, i could connect but others couldnt so once i got hamachi it all worked

Read full topic

item.title: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @darkfowlman darkfowlman
item.description:
@darkfowlman wrote:

Well i think that i did everything right, i can log in on local host and all that, but when i check my server ip on rune-locus it days my server is offline. Do you think that its just because im running the server? or is it offline.

Read full topic

item.title: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @owner_purez owner purez
item.description:
@owner_purez wrote:

no no, click start tab, find run,type cmd,type ipconfig, fnd the 192.168.#.###,go to portfofward, enter that number,save

Read full topic
item.source: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]

item.title: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @darkfowlman darkfowlman
item.description:
@darkfowlman wrote:

If you want an easier way to find out if your server is available for other people to access it go to this link: http://runelocus.com/?action=statuscheck Then just type in your hosts name and your server IP and click check, it will tell you if your server is online or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:11, topic:238125”]Can other players connect to your server with your ip,

Sometimes computors don’t let the actual hosters connect with the server ip,
But rather with the ‘Localhost’ or ‘0.0.0.0’,

Its not to worry.[/quote]Or 127.0.0.1.

Read full topic

item.title: Help i only can connect to server with localhost not my ip.. [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You’re only supposed to be able to connect through localhost, 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0 or blank space, as the regular players can connect through your no-ip.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

delete the one you have and replace with

server TCP | 43594 - 43594 | TCP | 192.168.2.1 | 43594 - 43594
server UDP | 43594 - 43594 | UDP | 192.168.2.1 | 43594 - 43594

i can’t log in with my ip on my sever but other people can[you have to use localhost]. it’s just like that.
